Content.Name: Strengthening the Function of the Board of Directors and Supervisory Board
Content.Description: Artistic Creations Inc. plans to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the board of directors and supervisory board. This includes providing regular training to board members, increasing the proportion of independent directors, and optimizing decision-making processes to better align with the company's long-term vision and goals.

Content.Name: Enhancing Transparency and Quality of Information Disclosure
Content.Description: Artistic Creations Inc. recognizes the importance of transparent and high-quality information disclosure. As part of its improvement plans, the company aims to refine its information disclosure process and standards. This will ensure that all stakeholders receive timely, accurate, and comprehensive information, ultimately fostering greater trust and confidence in the company.

Content.Name: Strengthening the Internal Control System
Content.Description: Artistic Creations Inc. is committed to establishing and improving its internal control system to identify, assess, monitor, and report financial and operational risks. By enhancing the company's ability to withstand risks, the strengthened internal control system will safeguard the interests of shareholders and other stakeholders.

Content.Name: Integrating Sustainable Development and Social Responsibility
Content.Description: Artistic Creations Inc. recognizes the significance of sustainable development and social responsibility. The company intends to integrate these principles into its overall strategy, identify related risks and opportunities, and actively engage in initiatives that promote long-term value creation. By doing so, Artistic Creations Inc. seeks to reinforce its commitment to responsible corporate citizenship.
